meanings.definition: Happening or moving at an extremely fast speed.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarapid train zoomed past us in a blur.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah's ultrarapid sprint amazed the spectators.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarapid squirrel darted across the park, leaving everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by at an ultrarapid pace during the thrilling roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarapid river currents carried the raft downstream with incredible speed.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an extremely rapid rate of progress or change.
meanings.sent1: The ultrarapid growth of technology has revolutionized our lives.
meanings.sent2: The ultrarapid development of the city skyline was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The ultrarapid makeover of the old house left the neighbors astonished.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrarapid decision-making skills saved the day in the emergency.
meanings.sent5: The ultrarapid spread of the rumor caused chaos in the small town.
